title: Tensei Kizoku wa Taishi wo Idaku! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Age Progression   Depictions of Cruelty   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Love at First Sight   Maids   Male Protagonist   Military   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Otome Game   Polygamy   Pregnancy   Rebellion   Reincarnated in a Game World   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies
author: Nama
description:
Osamu Takahashi died in an accident and was reborn as Isaac, a family member of the Marquis of Wellord, with intact memories from his previous life.

However, he finds himself in the world of Otome game which his sister was playing.

The game’s theme is “Stealing Love”, that is stealing away fiancee’s from game characters.

All those characters in the game were terrible.

This is the story of a man who walks on the high road without reading the atmosphere in the world of an Otome game.>
